description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Asparagus & Cheese Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Asparagus,Mother's Day
name: Grilled Asparagus & Cheese Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slice sourdough seeds and grains loaf, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Bring a frying pan of water to the boil over high heat. Add asparagus and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Drain.
Combine coleslaw and oil in a bowl, and season with pepper.
Place bread on a baking tray. Top with asparagus and cheese. Place under grill for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted and golden. Serve grilled asparagus and cheese toast with coleslaw.
